Galrick.name: Galrick Almsford
Galrick.appearance: Tall, square framed blonde long bearded human with chainmail, longsword and shield with striking blue eyes.
Galrick.personality: Faith is the axis around which his life turns. Hhe doesnâ€™t waver easily, even under pressure.
Galrick.backstory: Born to humble clergy and raised to defend the helpless.
Galrick.notes: Lies make him physically uncomfortable; He speaks truths plainly, sometimes too bluntly.

Puss.name: Puss N. Boots
Puss.appearance: Small stature orange tabi with large ears, green eyes a soft white under belly. Wearing studded leather armor, boots a fancy belt and a fancy turqoius pirate hat with a peacock feather.
Puss.personality: Self described charming. Arrogant and overconfident.
Puss.backstory: As a kitten he was thrown into a river in a sock. He managed to escape and spent most of his life on the streets. Where he was taken in by a swordmaster. He learned mastery afrom the swordmaster and started adventuring when the swordmaster died.
Puss.notes: Prefers one sided solutions; often tries to pursuade NPCs with deciet or persuasion.

Tiktik.name: Tiktik Spellfeather
Tiktik.appearance: Medium sized raven with robes and side pack.
Tiktik.backstory: A traveling wizard whose aspirations lend towards necromancy and darkness.
Tiktik.notes: Prefers fatal solutions; often tries to instigate NPCs with words.

Juna.name: Juna
Juna.appearance: Tall tan skinned, purple eyes with breeches, wearing a great axe and two hand axes.
Juna.personality: Young naive and quick to anger.
Juna.backstory: Lived in a forest for most of her life, isolated from society gaining favor with a local barbarian tribe.
Juna.notes: Prefers being up front and in the fray; often tries to intimidate NPCs with a show of strength.
